original_title: Paniolo O Hawai'i: Cowboys of the Far West
overview: This award winning feature documentary film redefines our childhood notions of cowboys and indians and the Great American West. In this beautifully crafted movie, Cowboys are the Indians. Hawaiiâ€™s Paniolo preceded the American Cowboy but their story remains virtually unheralded in frontier history. The film is a tribute to the men and women who learned much of their riding, roping, and saddle making from the great vaqueros of Alta California.
title: Paniolo O Hawai'i: Cowboys of the Far West
